arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Sevilla – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid and Sevilla will face each other in a LaLiga encounter on Saturday at the Riyadh Air Metropolitano. Both sides will be searching for an important victory, with Atletico aiming to maintain their impressive home form and championship challenge, whilst Sevilla look to turn their season around following recent league disappointments.
